title: The Breakfast Club Screening with Producer Q&... | 01/24/2025 7:00 PM | Creative Loafing
text:
The Breakfast Club Screening with Producer Q&A
From the venue:
Join Andrew Meyer, Executive Producer of the beloved classic ‘The Breakfast Club’ and SCAD Film and Television Professor, for a conversation about his extraordinary life journey and the road to producing what Entertainment Weekly hails as “The Best High School Movie of All Time.” From his early days in the record and film industry to his pivotal role in producing The Breakfast Club, Meyer will share fascinating insights into his creative process and explore the legacy of the film, which continues to resonate with audiences worldwide. Conversation will be followed by a screening of the iconic ‘The Breakfast Club’.
Tickets are free for SCAD Card holders and $10 for the general public. Reserve your tickets at SCADshow.com.
More information
At SCADShow Atlanta
Atlanta, GA - GEORGIA 30309
